abstract: In a respected consumer satisfaction survey, Google once again tops its rivals by a large margin.
snippet: In a respected consumer satisfaction survey, Google once again tops its rivals by a large margin.
lead_paragraph: Some pundits talk about Internet users having a “Google habit” that keeps them hooked on Google and keeps Google the No. 1 Internet search engine. That habit is far from harmful, and consumers don’t feel a need to kick it for a simple reason: Google gives them what they want.
